overview: Over two decades of storage industry leadership experience at both the start-up and global enterprise levels Previously was Managing Partner at Ward Capital, LLC Former Vice President and General Manager of North American Sales at StorageTek, where he consistently delivered sequential revenue growth Former Managing Partner of Enterprise Storage Ventures, LLC, where he drove investment and managed a portfolio of storage start-ups Over 14 years of top management experience at EMC where, in his last position, he served as VP of Worldwide Marketing, Software, and Professional Services
